Title: The people's railways, (expanding with) tremendous pace
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A 1952 series, devoted to the reconstruction of war damage and new construction of railways.The poster, "Railways across the country quickly repaired", shows repair works on the Bengbu Huaihe River Railway Old Bridge over the Huai River. One worker, Yang Liandi (杨连第), a veteran of the People's Volunteers fighting in Korea, is singled out.
Tags: Bengbu Huaihe River Railway Old Bridge
